typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 5)) ~> StagedParquet
StagedParquet sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataExtractionSinkAvro
